White people have evolved to be the most aesthetically diverse of the many races. Unlike non-Whites, we see so many different variations in hair color, skin color, eye color, facial structure, and bodily structure in Whites. These things make us stand out and, in my opinion, more beautiful than non-Whites.  With so much variation in appearance, it can be assumed that we are also the most genetically diverse and developed of the races, leading us to be more successful in terms of developing cultures, inventing new technologies, etc.  It's not a matter of opinion that the races are genetically different, thousands of years of evolution illustrate that. Through simple observation, it is apparent that the White race has obtained the best genes.

A rabbi was attacked at knifepoint in Vienna by a woman who ripped the Jewish skullcap from his head and yelled an anti-Semitic threat before fleeing, police in the Austrian capital reported on Tuesday.
